Class MarkerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osmdroid.views.util.constants.OverlayConstants

    public class MarkerBuilder
extends org.osmdroid.bonuspack.overlays.Marker
    MarkerBuilder Prepare a marker to be shown at the map. Download and set all it properties.
